org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.driver.as

Class ASBackend

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.driver.as.ASBackend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBackend

    public class ASBackend
extends Object
implements IBackend
    A concrete implementation of the IBackend API where the ASBlockWalker is used to traverse the IFileNode AST.
    Author:
    Michael Schmalle

      • createMXMLWalker

        public IMXMLBlockWalker createMXMLWalker(IASProject project,
                                List<ICompilerProblem> errors,
                                IMXMLEmitter mxmlEmitter,
                                IASEmitter asEmitter,
                                IBlockWalker asBlockWalker)
        Description copied from interface: IBackend
        Creates an AST walker capable of traversing MXML AST and calling back to the IASBlockWalker for ActionScript source code production.

        Use the #createWalker(IASProject, List, ASFilterWriter) method first and pass that instance into this method's walker parameter.

        Specified by:
        createMXMLWalker in interface IBackend
        Parameters:
        project - The current IASProject.
        errors - The current ICompilerProblem list.
